messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Re: Happy New Year, a real self-intro,and some  ques...
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 1/4/03 11:45:11 AM Eastern Standard Time, ... Wonderfully stated, Betsy.  I agree.  The only dumb question is the one not asked.. Teresa
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 1/4/03 11:45:11 AM Eastern Standard Time,
ecsamhill@... writes:

> Let's all do what we can to quash this "you should know that already"
> attitude and encourage questioning and learning at any age and on any
> day. (I think everyone can agree to that.)
>
> Betsy
>

Wonderfully stated, Betsy. I agree. The only dumb question is the one not
asked..

Teresa
